name: Carol Pilkington
who_you_serve: She serves individuals seeking to improve their relationships with themselves and others, particularly those interested in personal growth and self-development.
what_you_do: Carol Pilkington is a self-development expert and spiritual counselor who guides individuals through a series focused on creating joyful relationships, emphasizing love, compassion, and self-acceptance.
offering: Communication Training, Group Coaching, Spiritual Coaching
business_focus: Carol Pilkington is a self-development expert and spiritual counselor who guides individuals through a series focused on creating joyful relationships, emphasizing love, compassion, and self-acceptance.
